CustomField.formula: IF(AND(uses_the_eTrusted_platform__c = false, NOT(ISBLANK(next_eTrusted_Migration_Date__c))),"eTrusted Migration: " + TEXT(next_eTrusted_Migration_Date__c) +BR(), "") + IF(zz_membership_cancelled__c != "", zz_membership_cancelled__c + BR() , "") + IF(TRIM(Termination_reason_english_mapping__c) != "Termination Reason:", Termination_reason_english_mapping__c +BR(), "") + IF(AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL(status__c, 'Cancelled')), zz_certificates_disabled__c != ""), IMAGE("/resource/Invalid_Certificate", "Certificate disabled") + " " + zz_certificates_disabled__c + BR(), "") + IF(AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL(status__c, 'Cancelled')), zz_current_lift_case_status__c != ""), zz_current_lift_case_status__c + BR(), "") + IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( special_right_of_cancellation__c, "Yes"),ISPICKVAL( special_right_of_cancellation__c, "Yes - Already Granted")), "Special right of cancellation: Yes" + BR(), IF(ISPICKVAL( special_right_of_cancellation__c, "No"), "Special right of cancellation: No" + BR(), "")) + IF(AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL(status__c, 'Cancelled')), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Engagement_Status__c)))), "Enagement Status: " + TEXT(Engagement_Status__c) + BR(), "") + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Main_partner__c)), "Agency: " + Main_partner__r.Name, "")
CustomField.label: Critical Membership Information
